description: Array of financial documents identified from investor relations page links

items.description: A financial document (earnings release, presentation, etc.)

link_index.description: Index of the link in the provided list (1-based)

title.description: Title or name of the document

release_date.description: Release date in format YYYY-MM-DD, MM/DD/YYYY, or null if not found

fiscal_year.description: Fiscal year of the document (e.g., 2024), or null if not determinable

fiscal_quarter.description: Fiscal quarter (1-4), or null if not determinable
